subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Third-seeded Juan Martín del Potro beat second-seeded Tomas Berdych, 6-3, 6-1, to reach the ABN Amro World Tennis final in Rotterdam, Netherlands.
snippet: Third-seeded Juan Martín del Potro beat second-seeded Tomas Berdych, 6-3, 6-1, to reach the ABN Amro World Tennis final in Rotterdam, Netherlands.
